Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.observer.Observable<GameMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Game
extends Observable<GameMessage>
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Class representing the state of a game.

  • Method Details

    • newPlayer

      public void newPlayer​(java.lang.String name, int age, int virtualViewId)
      Adds a player to the players Vector.
      Parameters:
      name - the player's username.
      age - the player's age.
      virtualViewId - the unique identifier for the VirtualView to which the player interfaces.

    • sortPlayers

      public void sortPlayers()
      Sorts elements of players vector depending on players age.

    • assignColors

      public void assignColors()
      Sets the color of the players' workers according to the order: first player is blue, second is red, third is yellow.

    • translatePlayersVector

      public void translatePlayersVector​(int index)
      Translates the Players' Vector so that the Start Player is at index = 0.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the Start Player before the method's call.

    • sendDeck

      public void sendDeck()
      Sends via socket a message containing

    • displayAvailableCards

      public void displayAvailableCards()
      Show cards that can be chosen to current player. If all cards are already taken moves on to the next game step.

    • performPowerAssignment

      public void performPowerAssignment​(PlayerAction cardSelection)
      Verifies if the assignment can be done and if so decorates the current player with the chosen power.
      Parameters:
      cardSelection - the PlayerAction containing the chosen card.

    • start

      public void start()
      Sends all the necessary messages to begin the actual game. It is called after the Challenger's start player selection.

    • checkTokens

      public void checkTokens​(Worker currentWorker)
      Notifies the observers with a message accordingly with current worker's action tokens.
      Parameters:
      currentWorker - the worker chosen by the player at the beginning of his turn.

    • performWorkerChoice

      public void performWorkerChoice​(PlayerAction workerSelection)
      Verifies if the choice can be done and if so initializes worker's token and notifies with a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      workerSelection - the object representing the player's selection.

    • performMove

      public void performMove​(PlayerAction moveSelection)
      Verifies if the move can be done, if so performs it and notifies the observers with a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      moveSelection - the message representing the move action.

    • performBuild

      public void performBuild​(PlayerAction buildSelection)
      Verifies if the move can be done, if so performs it and notifies the observers with a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      buildSelection - the object representing the build action.

    • performChoice

      public void performChoice​(PlayerAction choiceAction)
      Verifies if the choice can be done, if so performs it and notifies the observers with a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      choiceAction - action chosen by the player

    • notifyBoard

      protected void notifyBoard()
      Notifies observers with a BoardMessage object.

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(Player currentPlayer)
      Set the nex player in the players Vector to current.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - player who has just finished his turn.

    • notifyWinner

      public void notifyWinner​(Player currentPlayer)
      Notifies all the player with a message containing the name of the winner.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player that has won.

    • performLoss

      public void performLoss​(Player currentPlayer)
      Handles the losing of a player by removing him from the game.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player that has lost.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)
      Eliminates a player from the game by removing his workers from the board.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be removed.

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.Vector<Player> getPlayers()

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers​(java.util.Vector<Player> players)

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer​(Player currentPlayer)
      If the passed Player can play sets its playing attribute to 'true' and notifies the VirtualView.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the member of the players Vector which is going to play.

      public Box[][] getBoard()

    • getBox

    • setExtractedCards

      public void setExtractedCards​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> extractedCards)
      Sets the extracted cards and ends current player's turn.
      Parameters:
      extractedCards - the Map associating the card's ids and their names.
